sentences.pinyin: Zhè shì wǒmen de tèjià tàocān.
sentences.translation: This is our special set meal.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我在餐厅点了一个海鲜套餐，里面包括了鱼、虾和蟹。
sentences.traditionalText: 我在餐廳點了一個海鮮套餐，裡面包括了魚、蝦和蟹。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zài cāntīng diǎnle yīgè hǎixiān tàocān, lǐmiàn bāokuòle yú, xiā hé xiè.
sentences.translation: I ordered a seafood set meal at the restaurant, which included fish, shrimp, and crab.
